Method Detail

getAssembler

public Assembler getAssembler(java.lang.String name)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
Pulls out an instance of an Assembler Object by name.

Parameters:
name - Name of requested Object.
Returns:
An Assembler object or null.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - a generic exception.
